text: Aryeh Gamliel (, 11 March 1951 - 6 August 2021) was an Israeli politician and rabbi. He was a member of the Knesset for Shas between 1988 and 2003. Gamliel was born in Beersheba, Israel. From 1996 until 1999, Gamliel was Deputy Minister of Religious Affairs. Gamliel died on 6 August 2021 in Tel Aviv, aged 71.Rabbi and former Deputy Minister Aryeh Gamliel passes away ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Israeli rabbis Category:Israeli politicians
title: Aryeh Gamliel
